pageTitle: St. Louis County Library named one of Post Dispatch’s Top Work Places | St. Louis County Library
textBeforeTable: -Year20112012201320142015 Choose a year: Press Release Archive ###       Staff responded to questions about job satisfaction, benefits, management, training opportunities and leadership. Answers were on a 7-point scale ranging from "strongly agree" to "strongly disagree." Two questions allowed respondents to write their own comments. All answers went to Workplace Dynamics, which created a summary. A question-by-question analysis will be sent to the library in a few weeks.   Library Director Kristen Sorth said, "We want our employees to be happy and to love their job. The mission of the St. Louis County Library has an impact on this. As library employees, we are incredibly lucky to be able to come to work every day and have an impact on the lives of our customers. SLCL employees are passionate about
